name: Tart Cherry Cocktail
description: This simple tart cherry cocktail is the perfect antidote to mid-winter gloom.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce tart cherry juice concentrate (see note)
1/2 ounce freshly squeezed lime juice, from 1 lime

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add tart cherry juice concentrate, Cointreau, lime juice, and vodka. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lime slice or twist and serve.
